title: Blended Feedback Strategy Workshop for Remote Design Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational design concepts and proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Real-time collaborative activities and asynchronous feedback using personal devices

learning_goals: Learners can specifically identify visual/conceptual strengths and areas for improvement in design work through audio feedback
Learners improve design principle application ability by at least 20% by referencing summarized text feedback
Learners perform iterative design revisions at least three times based on a blended feedback model
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
